doc.after: The de facto C official language is Spanish spoken by almost all Argentines 235 The country is the largest Spanish speaking society that universally employs voseo the use of the pronoun vos instead of t you which imposes the use of alternate verb forms as well Due to the extensive Argentine geography Spanish has a strong variation among regions although the prevalent dialect is Rioplatense primarily spoken in the La Plata Basin and accented similarly to Neapolitan language 236 Italian and other European immigrants influenced Lunfardo the regional slang permeating the vernacular vocabulary of other Latin American countries as well
